product_name: Mountain House Vegetarian Precooked Eggs - 1.5 Servings
long_description: Now you can enjoy delicious scrambled eggs wherever your adventure takes you. Just add hot water to the pouch and in 8 - 10 minutes you'll have a hot, tasty breakfast.
short_description: Now you can enjoy delicious scrambled eggs wherever your adventure takes you. Just add hot water to the pouch and in 8 - 10 minutes you'll have a hot, tasty breakfast.
